channel.title: Science project

item.title: Science project
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:10, topic:43484”][quote author=Hex Key link=topic=60494.msg737669#msg737669 date=1168017959]
The blue liquid was more than likely Copper Sulphate.

That is the standard chemical used in evapoation experiements.
[/quote]
Rings a bell, so that must be the one. How do you remember that sort of thing though? I couldn’t list off stuff I did in year 7 science at all. Ah well, I’m doing chem for the next two years, so maybe I’ll come out better.
As for all teachers being idiots, I go to a catholic school, and for the most part they aren’t. There are exceptions though. -.-[/quote]
Meh, i have an insane memory, i cant help it. good luck with Chemsitry its very hard indeed, i did it at A-level and now study Biochemsitry at University.

item.title: Science project
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Hmm, I can’t really remember the specifics of what I did in science in my year 7 of school. We created a blue liquid, and then left it to evaporate; the remainder became crystals. We also did some basic experiments like heating water - Of course, hardly an experiment… just an exercise so we could learn to use bunsen burners.

Read full topic

item.title: Science project
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

All teachers at secondary level are fuckwits, they are retards that almost failed their degreses, no industrial buisness would take there wank attitudes so they did ateaching qualification adn tought kids. Teachers are retarded, ask them about there qualification, if they sound impressive you either 1)know nothing or 2) there lying heavily. Dont let teachers pretend their clever!

Year seven science? i reccommmend a Hookes Law experiment (google it, its very simple to do with exension in wires and their elastic limit, it basically involves attaching weights to a length of wires, seeing how far it stratvhes and when it breaks). Or just do electricity, prove the 2 resistance equation (parralel and series).

Incase you reall lazy pm me or add em to msn( check my profile) i have a wealth of well documented science experiments at your sort of level.

Read full topic
